alert.note: Alert for Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 10:50PM EDT until March 13 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations around 1 to 3 inches. A glaze of ice up to one tenth of an inch from freezing rain is also expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. In Virginia, Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Mineral Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EDT Monday. Light snow will mix with light freezing rain and freezing drizzle at times tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
